function:
def priority(item: float, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """Returns priority with which we want to add item to each bin.

    Args:
        item: Size of item to be added to the bin.
        bins: Array of capacities for each bin.

    Return:
        Array of same size as bins with priority score of each bin.
    """
    """Further improved version of `priority_v1`.
    Now considering multiple factors for priority calculation.
    """

    if np.all(item <= bins):
        return np.zeros_like(bins)

    priorities = np.zeros_like(bins)
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    min_capacity = np.min(bins)
    avg_capacity = np.mean(bins)
    total_capacity = np.sum(bins)

    for i in range(len(bins)):
        if bins[i] == max_capacity:
            priorities[i] = abs(item - bins[i]) / (avg_capacity - min_capacity)
        elif bins[i] == min_capacity:
            priorities[i] = abs(item - bins[i]) / (avg_capacity - max_capacity)
        else:
            priorities[i] = (item - bins[i]) / total_capacity

    return priorities
